comment: Today was surprisingly cool, but tomorrow will be warm, and have rain showers later.
I wonder which I will end up having enjoyed more.
I wish we would get some rain. It’s hot here
Favorite detail is definitely the fact that her arm snapped the restraint like it was nothing.
Apparently there is a person in the Marvel movies whose sole job was to edit and scrub Loki scenes of Hiddleston’s crotch to keep it family friendly in that fitted costume
I don’t know how to respond to this
"What do you do for a living?"
"...I edit crotch bulges out of Marvel films..."
Hiddleston’s said his costume was hard to get into and really warm - especially with the hair added on
But that tight too? Can he breathe?
I do love the hair tho. So floof. And it’s curly at the ends
Okay, I'm just imagining Loki after Hulk had his "puny god" moment
I do however I am able to curb this by using programs to block YouTube on certain time intervals so I can put attention to other stuff.
Like reading books, playing games, or learning something new.
the eureka moment when "getting it" when learning something new is so great
but learning is hard, so ... i often resort to watching youtube/hbo/netflix :/ should just stare at wall until motivated to learn something instead :P
For me, the hardest part is just start. Once you start doing something you are suppose to do, then the task is not as dreadful as you thought.
You have to remember you are expending more energy anticipating an 'unpleasant task' than actually doing said task.
I think procrastination is my biggest problem, haha.
Even just thinking about chipping away at my games backlog is enough to start it.
I see tiny kitten picture. Cue the high pitch awwwwwww. My cat then comes rushing to investigate her rival
Luckily, if they compete for cuteness, you WIN!
If you don't make some kind of high-pitched noise when seeing baby cats and dogs, then you have no soul.
Also, have you seen baby bunnies?  I swear I could shatter glass <3
I’m happy to see baby anything as long as it’s not human
So I'm not the only one to think newborn babies are ugly? Good to know!
...now I want to know if keidran / basitin babies are like human babies.  Are they cute from the getgo?  Or does it take a few months?
no i think babies are cute. if you're not an aunt or uncle you cant understand how much little humans mean
unfortunate that fathers and mothers will never understand :V
yea aka my sister. she is so....urrrr
i appreciate my nieces, little cousins, and nephew so much
I’ve come to realize even I don’t know my type
And children for me are tolerable for small times
i was almost done cleaning the floors too...
Well, the odds of it dying between uses *is* rather small ^^;
i was like almost done with the apartment and it dies
Vacuum: "Forgive me Rima-samaaaaaaa, I can't go on" :ptv-whiny:
Aaaaaaaaaand to traumatize everyone, just imagine what *almost* happened to the vacuum is what happened to Mr. Air Conditioner from The Brave Little Toaster
Also face scrubs don’t taste as good as they smell. And I can’t seem to wash it out
